projects.title: School Website
projects.desc: Interactive, information website showcasing school's features, programs, and community.

projects.title: Food Landing Website
projects.desc: Website boasts an intuitive and user-friendly interface, ensuring an effortless and enjoyable browsing experience.

projects.title: Travel Booking
projects.desc: A travel booking landing website with a user-friendly interface, ensuring an effortless and enjoyable browsing experience.

projects.title: Spring-Boot CRUD App
projects.desc: A simple Spring Boot application implementing CRUD operations using REST APIs, Spring Data JPA, and MySQL.

projects.title: Hotel Management System
projects.desc: A Hotel Management System built using Spring Boot, Spring Data JPA, and MySQL. Features include room booking, customer management, check-in/check-out tracking, and admin control panel. Designed with RESTful APIs for easy integration and scalability.

projects.title: School Management System
projects.desc: A School Management System developed using JSP, Servlet, and JDBC. It includes student registration, teacher management, class-wise assignments, result handling, and an admin dashboard. Designed with a MySQL backend for dynamic data management.
